about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a world where every second is important, fight against opponents, upgrade your character and be ready to face horror when time runs out. Will you be on time?

Gameplay

The game sends you to randomly generated caves with a wide variety of paths, which is filled with monsters and creepy creatures.


You will have to make buildings, scaffolding or use special tools to get to the most inaccessible and dark corners of the dungeons. Unique events, objects and plants await you in caves, will be useful for creating powerful weapons necessary for survival.

You do not have to start the game over again as is customary in classic roguelike, after your death you will be transported return back in time where you will continue your journey. But be careful, once returned to past, the present will be lost forever.

name: The Passage Of Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Dual Core, 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Challenge the passage of time and try to survive in dark dungeons while fighting with their inhabitants. Create unique weapons, develop skills and explore caves. But be careful - time is running out ...
